125.name: Shroud of the Shadow Wraith
125.description: An all-encompassing darkness seeps through the walls, and from within it, the silhouette of a vengeful wraith emerges, its whispering cloak promising to smother the light from your soul.
125.resolution: Standing perfectly still, you blend into the insignificant light until the wraith's cloak passes through, leaving naught but the echo of its touch.

126.name: Breath of the Void
126.description: An unseen suffocating presence fills the air with dread, each breath you take a silent scream as the essence of the abyss hunts for the warmth of life to extinguish.
126.resolution: Holding your breath, you become one with the silence of the void, unnoticed by the ravenous emptiness.

127.name: Specter of Tarnished Mirrors
127.description: Haunting reflections twist and contort in the estate's mirrors as an ethereal specter, born from the shattered vanity of a bygone era, reaches out to the material realm seeking a visage to claim.
127.resolution: You move without casting a reflection, a ghost to the mirrors, until the specter retreats back into the fractured glass, quiet once more.

128.name: Ironclad Revenant
128.description: With creeping inevitability, the clanking drone of a relentless, armored apparition echoes increasingly louder, its iron fists ready to pound the life from all it encounters.
128.resolution: Careful to make no sound, you elude the rhythm of the revenant's march until it recedes into the distance, its purpose unfulfilled.

129.name: Whispers from the Verdant Prison
129.description: A malignant overgrowth of thorns and vines erupts to ensnare you, the whispers of those entombed within urging you to join them in their leafy crypt.
129.resolution: Avoiding even the slightest brush against the ensnaring verdure, you escape its grasp as the whispers subside, the growth retreating back to sleep.

130.name: Prowler in the Periphery
130.description: The faint, yet unmistakable sound of footsteps echo through the halls, always just beyond sight but ever-present. Its pace quickens as your back turns, yet halts abruptly when you gaze into the murky gloom.
130.resolution: Only by mirroring the silence and stillness of death does the presence relent, its footsteps fading into nothingness.

131.name: Visage of Hollowed Judgement
131.description: Carved stone faces adorn the wall, their hollowed eyes following your every move. A suffocating air of judgement presses down on you as you navigate the room, feeling as though any misstep could be your last.
131.resolution: It is with bated breath and weightless steps that you evade their ever-watchful gaze, escaping their stony verdict.

132.name: Breath of the Ironmonger's Apparition
132.description: The cold whiff of metallic air fills your lungs, the clanging of immaterial anvils thundering ever closer. An invisible smith seeks to forge you in unseen chains.
132.resolution: Stifling each breath, you disperse the chilled air, and the spectral smith fades, his malice left unfulfilled.

133.name: Ethereal Gardener's Thirst
133.description: Where the ghost of a tormented gardener once toiled, a petrifying chill follows. Each footstep across the cold earth seems to quench an unnatural thirst.
133.resolution: Ceasing all movement, you become as dormant as the winter soil, causing the gardener's presence to withdraw.

134.name: Lurker Amidst the Timepiece
134.description: The incessant ticking of unseen clocks grows ever louder, synchronized with your rising pulse. A dread sense of inevitability looms, as if time itself were stalking you.
134.resolution: Suspending your own moment in time, the clocks fall silent, the imaginary chaser lost to a standstill hush.

135.name: Sobbing Shadows of the Forsaken
135.description: The walls echo with the melancholy weepings of those once bound by tragedy. Echoes that haunt the corners, seeking solace in new sorrow.
135.resolution: Only through a passed procession, silent as grief itself, do the mournful shadows disperse, granting quietus.

136.name: Crimson Spectre in the Looking Glass
136.description: Mirrored surfaces weep droplets of crimson, and in their reflective pools, a malevolent spectre seeks to draw you into a grisly tableau.
136.resolution: By averting your gaze and touching not a single shard, the bloody reflection dries, the spectre trapped once more.

137.name: Sentinel of the Twisted Iron
137.description: A grotesque figure of contorted iron floats through the halls, its limbs lacerating the space where flesh should be. A spectral warden of rusty blades, it awaits any sign of your breath to strike.
137.resolution: In the silence of held breath, the iron sentinel passesâ€”its hunt fruitless, its blades only cleaving shadow.

138.name: Entangler in the Emerald Enigma
138.description: A labyrinth of vines and leaves winds swiftly around you, leaving no path untwined. The verdant trap tightens with every move you dare to make.
138.resolution: Immobility is your ally, as the verdure seeks a struggle that does not come. In stillness, the foliage retracts.

139.name: Cacophony of the Clockwork Courtier
139.description: Whirring and clicking fill your ears as a clockwork figure shrouded in royal garb patrols with vigilance. Its gears spin a dance of death to the tempo of your racing heart.
139.resolution: You move in counterpoint to the clockwork tempo, slipping by the courtier, a silent shadow in its mechanical watch.

140.name: Echoes of the Obsidian Specter
140.description: Black mist coalesces amid faintly seen corridors, from which a formless specter emerges, its mere presence leeching the warmth from the air and filling the heart with unspeakable dread.
140.resolution: Your unseen passage through the chilling darkness leaves the specter grasping at the void, its existence fading with your undisturbed breath.

141.name: Silhouette of the Iron Maiden
141.description: The unnerving silence is pierced by the creak of an unseen iron maiden, its ghostly silhouette manifesting to any who dare to make a sound, hungry to enclose them within its merciless grasp.
141.resolution: By moving with the stillness of a shadow, the threatening presence recedes, as if fearing the quietude of the grave.

142.name: Haunting of the Stone Guardians
142.description: Carved visages of bygone guardians flicker through the walls, their whispers petrifying the very soul, as they stand sentinel over secrets long forgotten.
142.resolution: Through silent mists, you pass unwatched, the stony glares averted by your hushed reverence to their ancient duty.

143.name: Visions of the Verdant Maw
143.description: Whispers of writhing foliage permeate the shadows, where the verdant maw of nature's abomination lies in wait, eager to consume those who disturb its sinister slumber.
143.resolution: Your delicate passage leaves the monstrous growth befuddled and yearning, its hunger unfulfilled in the wake of your ephemeral touch.

144.name: Grimoire of the Forgotten Machines
144.description: An arcane energy hums through the air, giving rise to ephemeral clockwork constructs that seek to ensnare the essence of the living within their intricate, forgotten gears.
144.resolution: By sidestepping time's relentless march, you escape unbound, leaving the ghostly machinery to wind down into silence.

145.name: Chill of the Gothic Requiem
145.description: The echoes of a forlorn requiem resonate through the stony halls, the lamentation of gothic spirits who bewail their untimely demise with a frost that seeps into the soul.
145.resolution: Mimicking the stillness of the entombed, you navigate through the sorrowful din, granting peace to the restless by your unnoticed passage.

146.name: Apparition of the Ebon Coven
146.description: With a devilish chill, the shadowy vestiges of a coven of old materialize, enacting profane rituals that menace to ensnare the will of those caught in their malignant gaze.
146.resolution: Your presence dissipates like the faintest of whispers amidst their ominous incantations, and you emerge untouched and unclaimed.

147.name: Reflections of the Mourning Wraith
147.description: Mirrors tarnish with the tears of a mourning wraith, each reflective surface becoming a gateway for the sorrow that yearns to drag the living into endless despair.
147.resolution: You move in the lament's blind spot, fading from its grievous search as it wails for a companionship that you deny.

148.name: Whispers of the Corroded Sentinel
148.description: A shrouded figure of rust and ruin patrols the forgotten passages, its whispers heralding the agony of decay, seeking to corrode both flesh and spirit with its touch.
148.resolution: Your tread leaves no echo in its wake, and without a sound to follow, the sentinel's malevolent watch ends, lost to the void.

149.name: Ensnarement of the Thistle Crown
149.description: The air becomes thick with the scent of ancient blooms from a crown of thistles, which lays a cursed claim on those who disturb its reign with the rustling of life.
149.resolution: Passing like a zephyr, you leave the cursed crown without a subject to ensnare, its dominion fading as if it were but a dream.
